Complete one of the following tasks in at least 250 words.

1.    Your school is considering reducing the time devoted to sports in order to give more lessons.  
      Write a letter to the school principal either supporting or objecting to this idea.


2.    Write a diary entry that begins with these words: “I thought the weekend was going to be boring,
      but …”.


3.    Your best friend recently moved to another town and is having difficulty adapting to a new school.  
      Write an e-mail to him/her mentioning the problems and offering advice.


4.    Write a review for your school newspaper of a film that you have recently enjoyed.  Do not simply
      retell the story.
